lead_paragraph: A Michael Phelps fan who has autism has become an inspiration on his own after sharing his dream of competing in the Olympics one day on the swimmer's Facebook page.

headline.main: Facebook Post From Michael Phelps Fan With Autism Inspires
headline.print_headline: Facebook Post From Michael Phelps Fan With Autism Inspires
